column2: 이제 한양까지는 얼마 남지 않았어요. \n힘내서 남은 길도 잘 가보자구요!
column4: We are almost near Hanyang. Let's stay strong and finish the rest of the journey well!
column12: The fog is getting thicker... Maybe...
column20: The suspicious fox that's been watching us since earlier! Be careful...
column26: Well done! You've defeated the Gumiho!

column2: 그런데 무언가 불길한 예감이 드네요... \n대낮에도 안개가 자욱하고...
column4: But I have a feeling of unease... Even in broad daylight, there's thick fog hanging around...
column26: Huh? The fog is getting thicker...

column12: It seems like we are under the influence of illusion magic.

column10: 환영으로 사람을 홀려 간을 빼먹는 여우에 대한 이야기를 들은 적이 있어요.
column12: I've heard stories of fox monster enchanting people...

column10: 전설인 줄만 알았는데... \n조심해서 나아가는 게 좋겠어요.
column18: 환영에 빠진 상태로 고통 없이 죽는 편이 나았을 텐데...
column20: It would've been better to die without pain while under the illusion...

column18: 산 채로 간이 뜯기는 건 꽤나 아플 테니까 말이야!
column20: Being torn apart while alive would have been quite painful, you know!
